Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
text: Performs functional enrichment standard maic output range databases

title: Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
text: data -- Input format data_study p_threshold -- Threshold P value -- Default: 0.01 source -- Database -- combination GO, GO:MF, GO:CC, GO:BP, KEGG, REAC, WP, HPA -- Default: c("GO", "KEGG", "REAC", "WP", "HPA")

title: Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
text: GO = Gene Ontology (MF = molecular function; CC = cellular component, BP = biological process), KEGG = Kyoto Encyclopedia Genes Genomes, REAC = Reactome, WP = WikiPathways, HPA = Human Protein Atlas

title: Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
Functional enrichment plot — gp_plot
text: Create Manhattan plot functional enrichment results

title: Functional enrichment plot — gp_plot
Functional enrichment plot — gp_plot
text: gp_result -- return object gp_enrichment() is_interactive -- Interactive plot -- Default: TRUE

title: Functional enrichment plot — gp_plot
Functional enrichment plot — gp_plot
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  data_genes |>    gp_enrichment(0.001, "WP") |>    gp_plot(is_interactive = FALSE)  } }

code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  data_genes |>    gp_enrichment(0.001, "WP") |>    tidy_gp_results() |>    gp_table()  } }

what: Create a table of ARDS genes found in an alternative list of genes — overlap_table
title: Create a table of ARDS genes found in an alternative list of genes — overlap_table
text: Creates interactive html table genes found common ARDS MAIC user supplied list genes

title: Create a table of ARDS genes found in an alternative list of genes — overlap_table
Create a table of ARDS genes found in an alternative list of genes — overlap_table
text: data_genes -- Input format data_genes data_alternative -- Dataframe column gene symbols titled gene, unless data_biolitmine biolitmine -- TRUE FALSE -- Default = TRUE -- comparing BioLitMine result using data_biolitmine

title: Create a table of ARDS genes found in an alternative list of genes — overlap_table
Create a table of ARDS genes found in an alternative list of genes — overlap_table
text: Primary use compare ARDS MAIC results BioLitMine search MeSH term "Respiratory Distress Syndrome, Adult". secondary use case compare ARDS MAIC MAIC analyses performed different conditions e.g., pervious MAIC SARS-CoV-2 whole-genome studies.

title: Create a table of ARDS genes found in an alternative list of genes — overlap_table
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  overlap_table(data_genes, data_covidmaic, biolitmine = FALSE)  } }

what: Compute measures of gene overlap — test_gene_overlap
title: Compute measures of gene overlap — test_gene_overlap
text: Compute measures gene overlap maic genes subset user defined list genes

title: Compute measures of gene overlap — test_gene_overlap
Compute measures of gene overlap — test_gene_overlap
text: data_genes -- Input format data_study overlap_genes -- Input first column lists gene symbols n_data_genes -- Number maic genes include -- Default: '' universe -- Size gene universe. Either user defined integer "HGNC" = protein coding genes HGNC, "FANTOM_L" = genes expressed lung FANTOM5, "FANTOM_S" = genes expressed spleen FANTOM5 -- Default: "HGNC"

title: Compute measures of gene overlap — test_gene_overlap
Compute measures of gene overlap — test_gene_overlap
Compute measures of gene overlap — test_gene_overlap
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  test_gene_overlap(data_genes, data_biolitlmine, n_data_genes = 300, universe = "FANTOM_L")  } }

Create a table of genes identified in an alternative list not identified by ARDS MAIC — unidentified_table

Create a table of genes identified in an alternative list not identified by ARDS MAIC — unidentified_table
text: Primary use compare ARDS MAIC results BioLitMine search MeSH term "Respiratory Distress Syndrome, Adult". secondary use case compare ARDS MAIC MAIC analyses performed different conditions e.g., pervious MAIC SARS-CoV-2 whole-genome studies.

title: Create a table of genes identified in an alternative list not identified by ARDS MAIC — unidentified_table
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  unidentified_table(data_genes, data_biolitmine, biolitmine = TRUE)  } }
